Text: Dear Mr Lay Thank you for you leadership during our crisis You have demonstrated strength character and integrity so far and I am certain that you will continue to do so We all need you You have many people praying for you Even within our own walls at Enron there are several Bible Studies that occur throughout the week We have already lifted you up in prayer and will continue to do so During this trying time please do not become so weary that you forget where and who your source and strength come from The Lord is there to give you comfort peace love and strength You are His child Seek His face and let your dependency be on Him He will not fail you He never does I know that you are a busy man so I will keep this short Our prayers are with you Your sister in Christ Sonya Gasdia
Project Oz Report Cc Please see attached report If you have any questions please call Don Rollins at
